mapper.select: SELECT T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" , T5101."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" , T5101."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" , T5101."hihokenshaNo" , T5101."ninteiShinseiYMD" , T5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" , T5101."hihokenshaName" , T5101."hihokenshaKana" , T5101."seinengappiYMD" , T5101."age" , T5101."seibetsu" , T5101."yubinNo" , T5101."jusho" , T5101."telNo" , T7051."shichosonMeisho" , T5105."ninteichosaIraiKanryoYMD" , T5202."ninteichosaRirekiNo" , T5202."chosaItakusakiCode" , T5910."jigyoshaMeisho" , T5202."chosainCode" , T5913."chosainShimei" , T5202."gaikyoChosaTextImageKubun" , T5202."ninteichousaIraiKubunCode" , T5202."ninteichosaIraiKaisu" , T5202."ninteichosaJisshiYMD" , T5202."ninteichosaJuryoYMD" , T5202."ninteiChosaKubunCode" , T5202."chosaJisshiBashoCode" , T5202."chosaJisshiBashoMeisho" , T5150."renrakusakiYubinNo" , T5150."renrakusakiTelNo" , T5150."renrakusakiJusho" , T5150."renrakusakiShimei" , T5150."renrakusakiTuzukigara" , T5202."serviceKubunCode" , T5202."riyoShisetsuShimei" , T5202."riyoShisetsuJusho" , T5202."riyoShisetsuTelNo" , T5202."riyoShisetsuYubinNo" , T5202."tokki" , T5202."tokkijikoUketsukeYMD" , T5202."tokkijikoJuryoYMD" , T5206."jutakuKaishu" , T5206."tokubetsuKyufuService" , T5206."zaitakuService" , T5203."ninchishoNichijoSeikatsuJiritsudoCode" , T5203."shogaiNichijoSeikatsuJiritsudoCode" , T5116."chukanHyokaKomoku1gun" , T5116."chukanHyokaKomoku2gun" , T5116."chukanHyokaKomoku3gun" , T5116."chukanHyokaKomoku4gun" , T5116."chukanHyokaKomoku5gun" , T5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" , T5116."ninchishoJiritsudoIIijoNoGaizensei" , T5116."suiteiKyufuKubunCode" , T5116."jotaiAnteiseiCode" , T5101."nigoTokuteiShippeiCode" , T5101."ninteiShinseiRiyu" , T5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" , T5116."kijunJikan" , T5116."kijunJikanShokuji" , T5116."kijunJikanHaisetsu" , T5116."kijunJikanIdo" , T5116."kijunJikanSeiketsuHoji" , T5116."kijunJikanKansetsuCare" , T5116."kijunJikanBPSDKanren" , T5116."kijunJikanKinoKunren" , T5116."kijunJikanIryoKanren" , T5116."kijunJikanNinchishoKasan" , T5116."ichijiHnateiKeikokuCode" , T5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" , T5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD" , T5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD" , T5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan" , T5102."nijiHanteiYMD" , T5101."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" , T5122."tsuchiKubun" , T5102."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" , T5102."yokaigoJotaizoReiCode" , T5102."shinsakaiMemo" , T5102."shinsakaiIken" , T5502."shinsakaiOrder" FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" AS T5511 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" AS T5502 ON T5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = T5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS T5101 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5502."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5101."logicalDeletedFlag" = false INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho" AS T5201 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5201."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."logicalDeletedFlag" = false INNER JOIN ( SELECT max(DbT5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo") AS 最大履歴番号 , DbT5201."shinseishoKanriNo" FROM rgdb."DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho" AS DbT5201 WHERE DbT5201."logicalDeletedFlag" = false GROUP BY DbT5201."shinseishoKanriNo" ) AS 履歴書最大番号 ON 履歴書最大番号."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5201."shinseishoKanriNo" AND 履歴書最大番号."最大履歴番号" = T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" AS T7051 ON T7051."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = T5101."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" AS T5102 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5102."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho" AS T5116 ON T5116."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" AS T5105 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5105."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5202NinteichosahyoGaikyoChosa" AS T5202 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5202."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = T5202."ninteichosaRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5913ChosainJoho" AS T5913 ON T5913."shichosonCode" = T7051."shichosonCode" AND T5913."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" = T5202."chosaItakusakiCode" AND T5913."ninteiChosainCode" = T5202."chosainCode" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5206GaikyoTokki" AS T5206 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5206."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = T5206."ninteichosaRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5203NinteichosahyoKihonChosa" AS T5203 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5203."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = T5203."ninteichosaRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT ON("shinseishoKanriNo") "shinseishoKanriNo" , "renrakusakiYubinNo" , "renrakusakiTelNo" , "renrakusakiJusho" , "renrakusakiShimei" , "renrakusakiTuzukigara" FROM rgdb."DbT5150RenrakusakiJoho" ORDER BY "shinseishoKanriNo" ASC, "priority" ASC ) AS T5150 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5150."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5122TsuchishoHakkoJoho" AS T5122 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5122."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho" AS T5910 ON T5910."shichosonCode" = T7051."shichosonCode" AND T5910."ninteichosaItakusakiCode" = T5202."chosaItakusakiCode" WHERE T5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{kaisaiBangou} ORDER BY T5502."shinsakaiOrder"

select.id: get概況調査データサービスの状況等

mapper.select:
SELECT , , , ,
from rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho" AS "DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho" ON "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo" AS "DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo" ON "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho"."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = "DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo"."ninteichosaRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag" AS "DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag" ON "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho"."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = "DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag"."ninteichosaRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem" AS "DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem" ON "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho"."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = "DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem"."ninteichosaRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5210NinteichosahyoShisetsuRiyo" AS "DbT5210NinteichosahyoShisetsuRiyo" ON "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5210NinteichosahyoShisetsuRiyo"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho"."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = "DbT5210NinteichosahyoShisetsuRiyo"."ninteichosaRirekiNo"
"DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = #{申請書管理番号} AND "DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho"."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = #{認定調査依頼履歴番号}
ORDER BY "DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo"."remban" ASC , "DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag"."remban" ASC , "DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem"."remban" ASC , "DbT5210NinteichosahyoShisetsuRiyo"."remban" ASC

select.id: get概況調査データ前回情報
get要介護認定主治医意見書意見項目

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM (SELECT "shinseishoKanriNo", Max("ikenshoIraiRirekiNo") AS "ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" FROM rgdb."DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho" GROUP BY "shinseishoKanriNo") AS "DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem" AS "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem" ON "DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho"."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" = "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo"
"DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = #{申請書管理番号}
ORDER BY "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."remban"

result.property: イメージ共有ファイルID

mapper.select: SELECT T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" ,T5101."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" ,T5101."hihokenshaNo" ,T5115."imageSharedFileId" FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" AS T5511 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" AS T5502 ON T5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = T5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS T5101 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5502."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5101."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5115Image" AS T5115 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5115."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE T5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo"= #{kaisaiBangou}
